title: Requirements Gathering
description: Gather and document requirements for the EnvironmentalImpactSimulator from stakeholders.

title: Design the Simulation Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the EnvironmentalImpactSimulator, considering human activities and environmental impact metrics.

title: Database Design and Modeling
description: Design and create the database schema for storing human activities data and environmental impact metrics.

title: Frontend Interface Design
description: Design an intuitive interface for users to input human activities and view predicted environmental impact.

title: Backend Development - API and Logic Implementation
description: Implement APIs and underlying logic for data processing, simulation, and prediction.

title: DevOps Setup and Configuration
description: Set up development, testing, and production environments for the EnvironmentalImpactSimulator.
dependencies: Backend Development - API and Logic Implementation

title: Integration Testing
description: Verify that the different components of EnvironmentalImpactSimulator work together as intended.
dependencies: Backend Development - API and Logic Implementation

title: System Testing
description: Perform system-level testing to ensure the EnvironmentalImpactSimulator functions as expected across a range of scenarios.

title: Security Review and Implementation
description: Review the code for potential security vulnerabilities and implement necessary measures to protect data.
dependencies: Backend Development - API and Logic Implementation

title: Documentation
description: Create technical documentation for developers and users on how to use the EnvironmentalImpactSimulator.
dependencies: Backend Development - API and Logic Implementation
